sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { View, Text, TextInput, TouchableWithoutFeedback, TouchableOpacity, Button, Alert} from 'react-native';
import DateTimePicker from '@react-native-community/datetimepicker';



import CustomeTextInput from '../TextInput/CustomTextInput';
import styles from './styles'


const OrderFormModal=(props)=>{
    const [date,setDate]=useState(new Date())
    const [showDatePicker, setShowDatePicker]=useState(false)
    return (
        <TouchableWithoutFeedback onPress={()=>props.clickToClose()}>
            <View style={styles.container}>
                <TouchableWithoutFeedback>
                <View style={styles.contentWrap}>
                        <View style={styles.inputsContainer}>
                            <View style={styles.nameInput}>
                                <Text>Ad</Text>
                                <CustomeTextInput textContentType='givenName' />
                            </View>
                            <View style={styles.surnameInput}>
                                <Text>Soyad</Text>
                                <CustomeTextInput/>
                            </View>
                            <View style={styles.number}>
                                <Text>Mobil Nömrə</Text>
                                <CustomeTextInput placeholder='0501234567' keyboardType='numeric'/>
                            </View>
                            <View style={styles.amount}>
                                <Text>Neçə Ədəd</Text>
                                <CustomeTextInput keyboardType='numeric'/>
                            </View>
                            <View style={styles.amount}>
                                <Text>Neçə Nəfər</Text>
                                <CustomeTextInput keyboardType='numeric'/>
                            </View>
                            <View style={styles.dateAndTime}>
                                <Text>Vaxtı seçin</Text>
                                <Button title='showDatePicker' onPress={()=>{setShowDatePicker(true)}}/>
                                {
                                    showDatePicker && (
                                        <DateTimePicker
                                        testID="dateTimePicker"
                                        value={date}
                                        mode='date'
                                        is24Hour={true}
                                        display="default"
                                        onChange={date =>Alert.alert('date: ', JSON.stringify(date?.timeStamp))}
                                    /> 
                                    )
                                }

                            </View>
                        </View>
                        <View style={styles.buttonsContainer}>
                            <TouchableOpacity style={[styles.button, styles.buttonCancel]}>
                                <View>
                                    <Text>
                                        Ləğv et
                                    </Text>
                                </View>
                            </TouchableOpacity>
                            <TouchableOpacity style={[styles.button,styles.buttonConfirm]}>
                                <View>
                                    <Text>
                                        Təsdiqlə
                                    </Text>
                                </View>
                            </TouchableOpacity>
                        </View>
                    </View>
                </TouchableWithoutFeedback>
                                
            </View>
        </TouchableWithoutFeedback>
    )
}
export default OrderFormModal
